Text.Page:
Those Thulsan vermin are messing with the controls of the Divine Furnace!

Throw those {@LinkCreature:52#9006#Ksharan reavers}, {@LinkCreature:52#9007#ragers}, {@LinkCreature:52#5004#shadowweavers}, {@LinkCreature:52#5001#swordmasters}, {@LinkCreature:52#9008#dreadweavers} and {@LinkCreature:52#5002#archers} into the lava!

Report to Centurion Senelin at the Gravewatch of the Exiled when mission is complete.

Nice work, !

I was worried these unholy morons might blow the furnace up while fiddling with the controls. Keep up your good work.
Kill off those Ksharan idiots before they damage the Divine Furnace!
